Zac Scott

Software Engineering · Victoria University · contact@zaci.dev

I am an engaged, creative and quirky third year BE(Hons) Software Engineer at VictoriaUniversity, with industry experience in cyber security and regression testing for web.I have a strong passion for problem solving, Linux and mechanical keyboards.

Interests

Apart from software development, I also love to play with Linux. Researching into better programs and fiddling with my dotfiles. I also am a mechanical keyboard enthusiast, with a newfound love for small form factor and ortho-linear keyboards ( github.com/scottzach1/Planck ).

I also am a big fan of the outdoors, when given the opportunity. I love to go hiking in the Tararua's and Ruahine's, as well as mountain biking at Makara and Polhill reserve.
